LocationReload.summary: The location.reload() method reloads the current URL, like the Refresh button.

remarks.para:
The reload may be blocked and a SECURITY_ERROR
thrown. This happens if the origin of the script calling
location.reload() differs from the origin of the page that owns the
object. See Same-origin policy for more
information.

-The interface it belongs to.
-Similar methods: and
.
